<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.enginePreferenceHandlerBase</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.enginePreferencehandlers. Do not modify this. Create Another implementation class and set pref json object.</description>
        <name>enginePreferenceHandlerBase</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var enginePreferenceHandlerBase = Class.create();
enginePreferenceHandlerBase.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    process: function(sysClassName, entityId) {
		var pref ={};
		pref.skip_recalc = false;
		
//Pass json object like below based on new table name extended from planned task in new implemention class
//if (sysClassName == 'tsp1_project')
//pref = {'retainstartonwhenRelationAdded':false};
        return pref;
    },

    type: 'enginePreferenceHandlerBase'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-10 10:48:43</sys_created_on>
